mapper.insert: insert into db_checkstocklog (SEQUENCEID, SID, PRODUCTID, OLDSAVENUM, NEWSAVENUM, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, CORPID, PRODUCTNAME, DESCR) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldsavenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{newsavenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_checkstocklog set SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OLDSAVENUM = #{oldsavenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NEWSAVENUM = #{newsavenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTNAME = #{productname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SID, PRODUCTID, OLDSAVENUM, NEWSAVENUM, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, CORPID, PRODUCTNAME, DESCR from db_checkstocklog where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, SID, PRODUCTID, OLDSAVENUM, NEWSAVENUM, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, CORPID, PRODUCTNAME, DESCR from db_checkstocklog
